page.title: 20Farming (sheet 3)
page.content:
Blackmoor Estate employs a permanent staff of 80. Many others are employed, according to the season, on fruit picking and sorting. The Estate has a total of 380 cows in milk, and a dry stock of 200. A cow will produce between 4 and 6 gallons of milk each day for a period of 7 to 9 months. Each acre of land will yield between 3 and 4 tons of grain. The Estate in the Block consists of: Orchards 45 acres 3% Grass land 307 acres 30% Cereals 309 acres 38% Nursery stock 180 acres 17% Woodland 126 acres 11% Houses/buildings 36 acres 1%
Farming sheets by G.R.Walker,teacher.
